title: Tfal fl-iskejjel tal-Belt Valletta jingħaqdu ma’ tfal fil-Kosovo
description: Inizjattiva ġdida mill-Kunsill Lokali tal-Belt Valletta se tgħaqqad klassijiet tal-iskola primarja tal-Belt ma' dawk f'Rahovec fil-Kosovo permezz ta’ konferenzi online. L-inizjattiva edukattiva u kulturali bl-isem ta’ "Connecting Classrooms: Bridges of Culture and Innovation" tippermetti biex it-tfal miż-żewġ pajjiżi jesploraw u jaqsmu ma’ xulxin kulturi u esperjenzi fil-klassi, inkluż dawk edukattivi. The post Tfal fl-iskejjel tal-Belt Valletta jingħaqdu ma’ tfal fil-Kosovo appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: Children in Valletta schools join children in Kosovo
description_translated: A new initiative from the Valletta Local Council will combine City Primary School classes with those in Randa in Kosovo through online conferences. The educational and cultural initiative called "Connecting Classrooms: Bridges of Culture and Innovation" allows children from both countries to explore and share with each other cultures and experiences in the classroom, including educational ones. The post Children in Valletta schools join children in Kosovo appeared first on Newsbook.

title: Tfal fl-iskejjel tal-Belt Valletta jingħaqdu ma’ tfal fil-Kosovo
description: Inizjattiva ġdida mill-Kunsill Lokali tal-Belt Valletta se tgħaqqad klassijiet tal-iskola primarja tal-Belt ma' dawk f'Rahovec fil-Kosovo permezz ta’ konferenzi online. L-inizjattiva edukattiva u kulturali bl-isem ta’ "Connecting Classrooms: Bridges of Culture and Innovation" tippermetti biex it-tfal miż-żewġ pajjiżi jesploraw u jaqsmu ma’ xulxin kulturi u esperjenzi fil-klassi, inkluż dawk edukattivi. The post Tfal fl-iskejjel tal-Belt Valletta jingħaqdu ma’ tfal fil-Kosovo appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: Children in Valletta schools join children in Kosovo
description_translated: A new initiative from the Valletta Local Council will combine City Primary School classes with those in Randa in Kosovo through online conferences. The educational and cultural initiative called "Connecting Classrooms: Bridges of Culture and Innovation" allows children from both countries to explore and share with each other cultures and experiences in the classroom, including educational ones. The post Children in Valletta schools join children in Kosovo appeared first on Newsbook.

title: Tfal fl-iskejjel tal-Belt Valletta jingħaqdu ma’ tfal fil-Kosovo
description: Inizjattiva ġdida mill-Kunsill Lokali tal-Belt Valletta se tgħaqqad klassijiet tal-iskola primarja tal-Belt ma' dawk f'Rahovec fil-Kosovo permezz ta’ konferenzi online. L-inizjattiva edukattiva u kulturali bl-isem ta’ "Connecting Classrooms: Bridges of Culture and Innovation" tippermetti biex it-tfal miż-żewġ pajjiżi jesploraw u jaqsmu ma’ xulxin kulturi u esperjenzi fil-klassi, inkluż dawk edukattivi. The post Tfal fl-iskejjel tal-Belt Valletta jingħaqdu ma’ tfal fil-Kosovo appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: Children in Valletta schools join children in Kosovo
description_translated: A new initiative from the Valletta Local Council will combine City Primary School classes with those in Randa in Kosovo through online conferences. The educational and cultural initiative called "Connecting Classrooms: Bridges of Culture and Innovation" allows children from both countries to explore and share with each other cultures and experiences in the classroom, including educational ones. The post Children in Valletta schools join children in Kosovo appeared first on Newsbook.

title_translated: "Why have many measures been taken on 7 counterfeit ID cards?" - PN
description_translated: The Nationalist Party has strongly criticized the Labor Government, and accused it of launching an aggressive propaganda campaign to disrupt the Maltese and Gozitan public from its mismanagement of the residence and work permits system over the past 11 years. The Opposition claims that the Government has lost control so much that it does not know where registered individuals are located in fake addresses. - PN appeared first on Newsbook.

description_translated: This morning he was arraigned in court where he pleaded not guilty and was held in custody.

title: Miċħuda proposta għal żona ta’ protezzjoni mill-kaċċa qrib l-iskejjel – Birdlife Malta
description: Fil-Kumitat Ornis, ġiet miċħuda proposta ta’ Birdlife Malta biex tinħoloq żona ta’ protezzjoni mill-kaċċa ta’ 200 metru madwar l-iskejjel f’Malta u Għawdex. L-NGO qalet fi stqarrija li filwaqt li l-bajjiet, l-arterji prinċipali, u ċ-ċimiterji għandhom dawn iż-żoni ta’ protezzjoni, “huwa tal-mistħija u diżappuntanti li dawk li jpoġġu madwar il-mejda tal-Ornis—magħżulin mill-Gvern ta’ Malta—ma appoġġjawx l-inklużjoni tal-iskejjel f’din il-lista biex jipproteġu t-tfal tagħna.” Il-proposta tressqet quddiem il-Kumitat Ornis aktar minn sena ilu.The post Miċħuda proposta għal żona ta’ protezzjoni mill-kaċċa qrib l-iskejjel – Birdlife Malta appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: Rejected a proposal for a hunting protection area near schools-BirdLife Malta
description_translated: In the Ornis Committee, a proposal from Birdlife Malta was rejected to create a 200-meter hunting area across schools in Malta and Gozo. The NGO said in a statement that while beaches, main arteries, and cemeteries have these protective areas, "it is shameful and disappointing that those who sit around the Ornis table-chosen by the Government of Malta-did not support the inclusion of our schools." The proposal was submitted to the Ornis Committee more than a year ago.The Post rejected a proposal for a hunting area near schools-BirdLife Malta appeared first on Newsbook.

description: Rio Micallef ta’ 41 sena mill-Marsa, David Tabone ta’ 40 sena min-Naxxar u Darren James Vella ta’ 34 sena minn Birkirkara jinstabu akkużati li ttraffikaw id-droga ecstasy fl-2008. title_translated: The trial finds 2 guilty and relieves another in the case of ecstasy trafficking
description_translated: 41-year-old Rio Micallef from Marsa, 40-year-old David Tabone from Naxxar and 34-year-old Darren James Vella from Birkirkara are found accused of trafficking in 2008. The post The trial finds 2 guilty and releases another in the case of ecstasy trafficking appeared first on Newsbook.

title: Digriet ġdid tal-Vatikan jiċċara l-proċeduri dwar intenzjonijiet tal-quddies
description: F’Digriet approvat mill-Papa Franġisku f’Ħadd il-Palm, id-Dikasteru għall-Kleru ħareġ normi riveduti dwar id-dixxiplina tal-Knisja fejn jidħlu intenzjonijiet tal-quddies. Il-liġi aġġornata, li tidħol fis-seħħ nhar l-Għid, tfittex li tħares kemm l-integrità spiritwali tas-sagrifiċċju Ewkaristiku u kemm il-fiduċja li jpoġġu n-nies f’dak li tagħmel il-Knisja bl-offerti tagħhom.The post Digriet ġdid tal-Vatikan jiċċara l-proċeduri dwar intenzjonijiet tal-quddies appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: A new Vatican decree clarifies the procedures for Mass intentions
description_translated: In a decree approved by Pope Francis on Palm Sunday, the decaster for the clergy emerged revised norms on the discipline of the Church regarding Mass intentions. The updated law, which comes into effect on Easter, seeks to protect both the spiritual integrity of the Eucharistic sacrifice and the confidence that people put in what the Church does with their offers.
